participant_1.background:
Before I was a mom in telecommunications, I was a sniper in the army.
i would travel the world if i could.
I like to keep my laundry to a minimum, so I only do it once a week.
I'm happy to have a close family and met Jimmy Fallon the other day.
my prized possession is a bowie knife.

participant_2.background:
I don't have a lot of time to exercise because I work long hours at the museum, but I try to get out for a walk every day.
i work in a doctors office.
I love nature and my rose garden is one of my favorite places to be.
i am recently divorced.
I enjoy the feeling of new sneakers on my feet.

content.text: Hello there!
Hello! How are you doing today?
I am doing well! I just met Jimmy Fallon the other day!
Wow, that's so cool! What was he like?
He was really nice and down to earth. He is shorter than I thought!
Haha, I've heard that before. That's great that you got to meet him.
Yeah, it was a fun experience. I'm glad I had the chance.
So what do you do for a living?
I'm a mom and work in telecommunications. What about you?
I'm recently divorced and work in a doctors office. I love nature and my rose garden is one of my favorite places to be.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear about your divorce. I'm sure you'll find someone better for you.
Thanks! I hope so too. Do you have any hobbies?
I like to travel and I'm a huge fan of the outdoors. I also like to read and spend time with my family.
Those sound like great hobbies! I love to read too.
What's your favorite book?
It's hard to say, but I really enjoyed "The Great Gatsby".
That's a great book! I've read it a few times.
Me too! It's one of those books that you can read over and over again and still find something new each time.
I agree! It's a classic for a reason.
It is! We should talk more about books sometime.
I'd love that
